metadata.title: CVE-2016-3912 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The framework APIs in Android 4.x before 4.4.4, 5.0.x before 5.0.2, 5.1.xbefore 5.1.1, 6.x before 2016-10-01, and 7.0 before 2016-10-01 allowattackers to gain privileges via a crafted application, aka internal bug30202481.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
